PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-04012007-03-22,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActContraventions Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) by deleting references to offences that were abolished upon the repeal of the Diesel Fuel Regulations, and by revising the Short-Form Descriptions in the French version for two other offences (Schedule II.1 - Item 99 and Schedule XI - Item 24), one under the Maritime Provinces Fishery Regulations and the other under the Marine Activities in the Saguenay - St. Lawrence Marine Park Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0062 Publication Date: 2007-04-04
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) by deleting references to offences that were abolished upon the repeal of the Diesel Fuel Regulations, and by revising the Short-Form Descriptions in the French version for two other offences (Schedule II.1 - Item 99 and Schedule XI - Item 24), one under the Maritime Provinces Fishery Regulations and the other under the Marine Activities in the Saguenay - St. Lawrence Marine Park Regulations.
